title: Wedding Grooming Lounge
summary: On-location lounge with five barbers, skincare station, and first-look touch-ups.
description: We set up a full GrowthAutomations grooming lounge in a hotel suite with ambient lighting, custom playlists, and tailored service menus. Guests rotated through haircut refinements, beard detailing, and stress-relief scalp treatments. Everyone was ready on time.

thumbnail.alt: On-location grooming lounge setup with multiple barbers.

gallery.alt: Groom receiving hot towel treatment before the ceremony.
Barber aligning beard edges with straight razor.
